Update:  The story was impossible to understand, and most of the story is dragging you through this stereotypical "recovering hero" thing that never fucking ends.  "Yea, we get it already, where are the sick fight scenes I remember?"

Tony Jaa is amazing , introducing the world with Muay Thai Martial Arts. I've bought his last 3 movies: Ong Bak Thai Warrior, The Protector and Ong Bak 2 the beginning. I haven't seen this one yet but i suggest everybody watch the first 3 movies. Gotta say he is in the same category as all the other martial art Greats and Legendary fighters. Its awesome he ties in he's country's history, folk stories, legends and fighting style into his movies. May he always stays true to himself and his fellow countrymen and country.
